availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lebanon, Kentucky, barkeeper. Crab Orchard, Kentucky, native. Married to Mary A. Manuel Severance.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Lebanon District 2, p. 102. Marion County [Kentucky] Court, Probate Records, 1863-1902, Roll 598712: Administrators Bonds, Vol. 3, 1879-91, p. 227. Lebanon Standard and Times, April 27, 1887. Find A Grave, "John Severance (1831-1887)", Memorial # 105183455 http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=95025747&ref=acom (accessed 14 June 2016).
